greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: XOR BINOMIAL transform of A006068 (inverse Gray code).
comment: See A099884 for the definitions of the XOR BINOMIAL transform and the XOR difference triangle.
formula: a(2^n) = 2^(n+1)-1 for n>0, with a(0)=0 and a(k)=0 otherwise. a(n) = SumXOR_{i=0..n} (C(n, i)mod 2)*A006068(n-i) and SumXOR is summation under XOR.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 29 2004
